data.text: On a day off, I took Shinko Windy to the zoo.
data.processed: <story>On a day off, I took Shinko Windy to the zoo.

data.text:
Crocodiles! Hippos! Gorillas! 
C'mon, c'mon, let's hurry and go meet 'em all!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Crocodiles! Hippos! Gorillas! 
<story>C'mon, c'mon, let's hurry and go meet 'em all!

data.text:
All of them have bite strength that's the strongest! 
Feeding-time, especially, is a must-see!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>All of them have bite strength that's the strongest! 
<story>Feeding-time, especially, is a must-see!

data.text:
C'mon, we gotta hurry! 
We definitely have to see them at their best!!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>C'mon, we gotta hurry! 
<story>We definitely have to see them at their best!!

data.text:
Uooooooh! Look at that! The power of that croc! 
Gnawing on that with its big jaws!!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Uooooooh! Look at that! The power of that croc! 
<story>Gnawing on that with its big jaws!!

data.text:
Those teeth are amazing～! 
If it got you with those, you wouldn't stand a chance～!
data.name: Visitor A
data.processed:
<story>Those teeth are amazing～! 
<story>If it got you with those, you wouldn't stand a chance～!

data.text: Muu.
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: <story>Muu.

data.text: ……If Windy-chan bit you, it would be crazy too!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: <story>……If Windy-chan bit you, it would be crazy too!

data.text: The way it chomps with that big mouth is cute too～!
data.name: Visitor A
data.processed: <story>The way it chomps with that big mouth is cute too～!

data.text:
But look at how it can stand in the water～. 
That's kinda cute too～!
data.name: Visitor B
data.processed:
<story>But look at how it can stand in the water～. 
<story>That's kinda cute too～!

data.text:
Mumumu-! 
Just focusing on them, it's not fair!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Mumumu-! 
<story>Just focusing on them, it's not fair!

data.text: When it comes to bite strength, even Windy-chan can too……!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: <story>When it comes to bite strength, even Windy-chan can too……!

data.text:
Gradually, Shinko Windy's mood was worsening. 
At this rate, it could be bad……!
data.processed:
<story>Gradually, Shinko Windy's mood was worsening. 
<story>At this rate, it could be bad……!

data.text:
Goat King, looks like there aren't many 
visitors coming to see you this time either.
data.name: Zookeeper
data.processed:
<story>Goat King, looks like there aren't many 
<story>visitors coming to see you this time either.

data.text: Meeeeh……
data.name: Goat King
data.processed: <story>Meeeeh……

data.text:
……What's that? 
He's taking the goat for a walk.
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>……What's that? 
<story>He's taking the goat for a walk.

data.text:
Ahaha…… if you'd like, please play with him. He's really cute, 
but lately he hasn't been getting much attention……
data.name: Zookeeper
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha…… if you'd like, please play with him. He's really cute, 
<story>but lately he hasn't been getting much attention……

data.text: ……You, come with me for a bit.
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: <story>……You, come with me for a bit.

data.text:
And like this, then that, 
and then to finish it off……
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>And like this, then that, 
<story>and then to finish it off……

data.text:
Naa haa haa haa, how's that!? 
I triple braided his beard!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Naa haa haa haa, how's that!? 
<story>I triple braided his beard!

data.text:
Hmph! He can't get any attention because of his lame face! 
But Windy-chan is different!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Hmph! He can't get any attention because of his lame face! 
<story>But Windy-chan is different!

data.text:
Just watch, now I'm going to pull an amazing 
prank that'll get all of their attention!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Just watch, now I'm going to pull an amazing 
<story>prank that'll get all of their attention!

data.text:
Shinko Windy made that declaration before the goat. Maybe because 
she can relate to his troubles, she seemed reliable――
data.processed:
<story>Shinko Windy made that declaration before the goat. Maybe because 
<story>she can relate to his troubles, she seemed reliable――

data.text:
I had a sudden thought. Can't we use Windy's creativity here? 
Her prank seemed a little short-sighted, so maybe――
data.processed:
<story>I had a sudden thought. Can't we use Windy's creativity here? 
<story>Her prank seemed a little short-sighted, so maybe――

data.text:
Huh? What do you mean? 
Have the Goat King help with the prank……?
data.name: Shinko Windy

choices.text: He wants to stand out too

data.processed:
<story>Huh? What do you mean? 
<story>Have the Goat King help with the prank……?

data.text:
Hmmm, I guess so…… 
It does feel good to pull pranks.
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Hmmm, I guess so…… 
<story>It does feel good to pull pranks.

data.text:
Alright, hope you're ready, Goat King! 
Windy-chan's prank will be unforgettable!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Alright, hope you're ready, Goat King! 
<story>Windy-chan's prank will be unforgettable!

data.text: Meh- meeeeh?
data.name: Goat King
data.processed: <story>Meh- meeeeh?

data.text:
Now, where should I go next? 
Seems like giraffes and rhinoes are over there――
data.name: Visitors
data.processed:
<story>Now, where should I go next? 
<story>Seems like giraffes and rhinoes are over there――

data.text: Waah Haa Haa Haa!!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: <story>Waah Haa Haa Haa!!

data.text:
Goat King! All of your food has fallen in 
to the possession of me, Windy-sama!!
data.name: Shinko Windy

choices.text: How dastardly! As expected of Windy-sama!

data.processed:
<story>Goat King! All of your food has fallen in 
<story>to the possession of me, Windy-sama!!

data.text:
That girl, I only took my eyes off it for a moment……! 
I'm sorry Goat King!
data.name: Zookeeper
data.processed:
<story>That girl, I only took my eyes off it for a moment……! 
<story>I'm sorry Goat King!

data.text:
――W-what are they doing!? 
――They're standing near that cliff!
data.name: Visitors
data.processed:
<story>――W-what are they doing!? 
<story>――They're standing near that cliff!

data.text:
――They took that goat's food? 
――How sad……!
data.name: Visitors
data.processed:
<story>――They took that goat's food? 
<story>――How sad……!

data.text:
Haaa haa haa! 
Too bad for you, Goat King!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Haaa haa haa! 
<story>Too bad for you, Goat King!

data.text:
If only you had more power, you could take it back, huh? 
Being so weak must be frustrating～.
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>If only you had more power, you could take it back, huh? 
<story>Being so weak must be frustrating～.

data.text: Meeh…… Meeeeeh……
data.name: Goat King
data.processed: <story>Meeh…… Meeeeeh……

data.text: Meeeeeeeeeeeeh!!!!
data.name: Goat King
data.processed: <story>Meeeeeeeeeeeeh!!!!

data.text: Uooh!? That goat is climbing the cliff!
data.name: Visitor C
data.processed: <story>Uooh!? That goat is climbing the cliff!

data.text: Doing that so suddenly, is he okay?!
data.name: Visitor A
data.processed: <story>Doing that so suddenly, is he okay?!

data.text:
Wha-!? He's actually climbing…… Ahem! 
What amazing leg strength you have!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Wha-!? He's actually climbing…… Ahem! 
<story>What amazing leg strength you have!

data.text:
Hmmm, I'll let you join Windy-chan's gang! 
Here's your reward!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Hmmm, I'll let you join Windy-chan's gang! 
<story>Here's your reward!

data.text:
――The Goat King is amazing! 
――Windy-chan, you knew this was going to happen?
data.name: Visitors
data.processed:
<story>――The Goat King is amazing! 
<story>――Windy-chan, you knew this was going to happen?

data.text:
――That was fun! 
――Do it again!
data.name: Visitors
data.processed:
<story>――That was fun! 
<story>――Do it again!

data.text:
Again, you say!? 
Wahahaha! Guess it can't be helped～!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Again, you say!? 
<story>Wahahaha! Guess it can't be helped～!

data.text:
Next I'll show you Windy-chan's power! 
Goat King, show them something even more amazing!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Next I'll show you Windy-chan's power! 
<story>Goat King, show them something even more amazing!

data.text: Meeeeeh! Meeeeeh!
data.name: Goat King
data.processed: <story>Meeeeeh! Meeeeeh!

data.text:
Kuuu～～～～～! 
That felt real good, huhーー!!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Kuuu～～～～～! 
<story>That felt real good, huhーー!!

data.text:
Really, thank you very much! 
The Goat King was able to get more visitors, and he seemed happy!
data.name: Zookeeper
data.processed:
<story>Really, thank you very much! 
<story>The Goat King was able to get more visitors, and he seemed happy!

data.text:
See ya later, Goat King! 
You've finally got your chance, make the best of it!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>See ya later, Goat King! 
<story>You've finally got your chance, make the best of it!

data.text:
We left the zoo and made our way back to the school. On the way 
back, Shinko Windy would occasionally look up at the sky.
data.processed:
<story>We left the zoo and made our way back to the school. On the way 
<story>back, Shinko Windy would occasionally look up at the sky.

data.text: ……It seems like everyone came, huh?
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: <story>……It seems like everyone came, huh?

data.text:
Windy-chan was amazing…… But that's a given. 
That's how it is normally. ……But……
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Windy-chan was amazing…… But that's a given. 
<story>That's how it is normally. ……But……

data.text: ……pranks, huh.
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: <story>……pranks, huh.

data.text:
Seeing her profile in the sunset, 
she seemed more mature than usual.
data.processed:
<story>Seeing her profile in the sunset, 
<story>she seemed more mature than usual.
